name: Ludum Dare 41 - ZombieGun Clicker
description:
You're doomed. Trapped in the middle of a zombie infested city with only one bullet left... but hey, what if you could use some of these zombie Essences to hire some demonic grandmas to make you more bullets. And then MORE bullets, lots and lots of bullets. If you had an attache case, it'd be full.

WASD: move
click: shoot
number keys: buy upgrades
X: return to base
Also, there's a cheat key that's not too hard to find.

If you want to see the source code, simply open the .love file as a zip.
